about_mission_challenges.metric: People use phones in local languages

our_solution_features.title: AI-Powered Solutions
our_solution_features.description: Smart chatbots, disease detection, and personalized learning experiences.

our_solution_features.title: Solar Energy Integration
our_solution_features.description: Sustainable power for digital infrastructure and smart classrooms.

our_solution_features.title: IoT & Mobile First
our_solution_features.description: Connected devices and mobile-optimized platforms for rural accessibility.

our_solution_key_features: Works offline and in low-connectivity areas
Inclusive design for all literacy levels

achievement.title: Model Village Achievement
achievement.description: This village has achieved 80%+ digital adoption across all focus areas and serves as an inspiration for other communities.

volunteer_roles.title: Digital Trainer
volunteer_roles.description: Teach digital literacy and essential computer skills to rural communities, fostering self-sufficiency.

volunteer_roles.title: Solar Technician
volunteer_roles.description: Install and maintain sustainable solar panels and energy systems, bringing clean power to homes.

volunteer_roles.title: Chatbot Content Creator
volunteer_roles.description: Develop engaging healthcare content and FAQs for our AI chatbot, improving access to information.

volunteer_roles.title: Language Translator
volunteer_roles.description: Translate vital educational and health content into local languages, making knowledge accessible.

sponsorship_options.name: Adopt a Student
sponsorship_options.impact: Provides a student with digital access and mentorship for one year
includes: Educational tablet with preloaded learning content
Access to a dedicated virtual mentor

sponsorship_options.name: Sponsor a Health Camp
sponsorship_options.impact: Delivers essential health services to over 200 villagers
includes: Basic health checkup kits and devices
Free telemedicine consultations after the event

sponsorship_options.name: Fund a Solar Panel
sponsorship_options.impact: Ensures clean, reliable electricity for a rural household

sponsorship_options.name: Gift an AI Farming Kit
sponsorship_options.impact: Empowers 10 farmers with smart agriculture tools
includes: AI plant disease diagnosis mobile app
Real-time weather alerts and crop tips

problems_faced.title: Lack of Access to Quality Education
problems_faced.description: Many rural students do not have access to smart classrooms, digital content, or trained educators, which hinders learning outcomes.

problems_faced.title: Limited Healthcare Access
problems_faced.description: Villages often face a shortage of healthcare professionals and diagnostic facilities, delaying essential medical care.

problems_faced.title: Unreliable Electricity Supply
problems_faced.description: Inconsistent power availability disrupts digital learning, healthcare operations, and mobile device usage in rural areas.

problems_faced.title: Low Agricultural Productivity
problems_faced.description: Farmers lack access to modern tools, timely weather alerts, and digital market linkages, resulting in reduced yields and profits.

problems_faced.title: Language Barriers in Digital Access
problems_faced.description: Most online platforms and content are not available in local languages, making digital services inaccessible for many villagers.

problems_faced.title: Low Digital Literacy
problems_faced.description: A significant portion of the rural population lacks basic digital skills, limiting their ability to use technology and benefit from schemes.

government_subsidy_schemes.name: DIGITAL INDIA - SMART CLASSROOM INITIATIVE
government_subsidy_schemes.description: Initiative to transform classrooms with digital technology and smart boards
eligibility: Schools in rural and remote areas

government_subsidy_schemes.name: PM-GRAMIN DIGITAL SAKSHARTA ABHIYAN (PMGDISHA)
government_subsidy_schemes.ministry: Ministry of Electronics and Information Technology
government_subsidy_schemes.description: Digital literacy programme for rural India to make digitally literate citizens
eligibility: Should not be a government employee

government_subsidy_schemes.name: PM-KUSUM (PRADHAN MANTRI KISAN URJA SURAKSHA EVAM UTTHAN MAHABHIYAN)
government_subsidy_schemes.ministry: Ministry of New and Renewable Energy
government_subsidy_schemes.description: Solar power scheme for farmers and rural areas

government_subsidy_schemes.name: SUB-MISSION ON AGRICULTURAL MECHANIZATION
government_subsidy_schemes.description: Financial assistance for purchase of agricultural machinery and equipment

government_subsidy_schemes.name: AYUSHMAN BHARAT DIGITAL MISSION
government_subsidy_schemes.ministry: Ministry of Health and Family Welfare
government_subsidy_schemes.description: Digital health ecosystem including health IDs and digital health records

focus_areas_content.title: Empowering Minds Through Digital Education
focus_areas_content.description: Bringing quality learning resources and digital literacy to every village child and adult.
initiatives: Smart Classrooms with Interactive Boards
E-learning Platforms in Vernacular Languages
Digital Literacy Workshops for All Ages
Tablet Distribution with Preloaded Educational Content
Virtual Mentorship Programs

focus_areas_content.title: Revolutionizing Rural Healthcare with AI
focus_areas_content.description: Leveraging AI for early disease detection, remote consultations, and health awareness.
initiatives: AI-Powered Diagnostic Tools for Common Ailments
Telemedicine Kiosks for Remote Doctor Consultations
Health Chatbots for Instant Medical Information
Preventive Healthcare Campaigns with Digital Tools
Data-driven Disease Surveillance Systems

focus_areas_content.title: Sustainable Power for a Brighter Future
focus_areas_content.description: Providing reliable and clean solar energy solutions for homes, schools, and community centers.
initiatives: Solar Micro-grids for Uninterrupted Power Supply
Solar-Powered Charging Stations for Devices
Installation of Solar Street Lights
Training Local Communities in Solar Panel Maintenance
Promoting Energy-Efficient Appliances

focus_areas_content.title: Boosting Farm Productivity with Smart Tech
focus_areas_content.description: Empowering farmers with digital tools for better crop management, weather insights, and market access.
initiatives: IoT Sensors for Soil Health Monitoring
AI-based Crop Disease Detection Apps
Real-time Weather Forecasts and Advisory
Digital Market Linkages for Fair Pricing
Training on Modern Farming Techniques
